þata allata gafastaida us jundai meinai.
LUKE 18.22 gahausjands þan þata Iesus qaþ du imma:
all þatei habais frabugei jah gadailei unledaim, jah habais huzd in himina, jah hiri laistjan mik.
LUKE 18.23 iþ is gahausjands þata gaurs warþ;
LUKE 18.24 gasaiƕands þan ina Iesus gaurana waurþanana qaþ:
ƕaiwa agluba þai faihu habandans inngaleiþand in þiudangardja gudis!
LUKE 18.25 raþizo allis ist ulbandau þairh þairko neþlos þairhleiþan þau gabigamma in þiudangardja gudis galeiþan.
þata unmahteigo at mannam mahteig ist at guda.
sai, weis aflailotum allata jah laistidedum þuk.
LUKE 18.29 iþ is qaþuh du im:

amen, qiþa izwis þatei ni ainshun ist þize afletandane gard aiþþau fadrein aiþþau broþruns aiþþau qen aiþþau barna in þiudangardjos gudis, LUKE 18.30 saei ni andnimai managfalþ in þamma mela jah in aiwa þamma qimandin libain aiweinon.
LUKE 18.31 ganimands þan þans ·ib· qaþ du im:
sai, usgaggam in Iairusalem, jah ustiuhada all þata gamelido þairh praufetuns bi sunu mans.
LUKE 18.32 atgibada auk þiudom jah bilaikada jah anamahtjada jah bispeiwada, LUKE 18.33 jah usbliggwandans usqimand imma, jah þridjin daga usstandiþ.
LUKE 18.34 jah eis ni waihtai þis froþun, jah was þata waurd gafulgin af im, jah ni wissedun þo qiþanona.
LUKE 18.35 warþ þan, miþþanei neƕa was is Iaireikon, blinda sums sat faur wig du aihtron.
LUKE 18.36 gahausjands þan managein faurgaggandein frah ƕa wesi þata.
LUKE 18.37 gataihun þan imma þatei Iesus Nazoraius þairhgaggiþ.
LUKE 18.39 jah þai fauragaggandans andbitun ina ei þahaidedi:
iþ is und filu mais hropida:
LUKE 18.40 gastandands þan Iesus haihait ina tiuhan du sis.
biþe neƕa was þan imma, frah ina LUKE 18.41 qiþands:
LUKE 18.42 jah Iesus qaþ du imma:
LUKE 18.43 jah suns ussaƕ jah laistida ina awiliudonds guda.
jah alla managei gasaiƕandei gaf hazein guda.
LUKE 19.2 jah sai, guma namin haitans Zakkaius,
sah was fauramaþleis motarje jah was gabigs, LUKE 19.3 jah sokida gasaiƕan Iesu, ƕas wesi, jah ni mahta faura managein, unte wahstau leitils was.
LUKE 19.4 jah biþragjands faur usstaig ana smakkabagm, ei gaseƕi ina, unte is and þata munaida þairhgaggan.
LUKE 19.5 jah biþe qam ana þamma stada, insaiƕands iup Iesus gasaƕ ina jah qaþ du imma:
himma daga auk in garda þeinamma skal ik wisan.
LUKE 19.6 jah sniumjands atstaig jah andnam ina faginonds.
LUKE 19.7 jah gasaiƕandans allai birodidedun, qiþandans þatei du frawaurhtis mans galaiþ ussaljan.
LUKE 19.8 standands þan Zakkaius qaþ du fraujin:
sai, halbata aiginis meinis, frauja, gadailja unledaim, jah jabai ƕis ƕa afholoda, fidurfalþ fragilda.
LUKE 19.9 qaþ þan du imma Iesus þatei
himma daga naseins þamma garda warþ, unte jah sa sunus Abrahamis ist;
LUKE 19.10 qam auk sunus mans sokjan jah nasjan þans fralusanans.
LUKE 19.11 at gahausjandam þan im þata, biaukands qaþ gajukon, bi þatei neƕa Iairusalem was, jah þuhta im ei suns skulda wesi þiudangardi gudis gaswikunþjan.
